name: Solanum_helix
distribution: Bahia (Brazil Northeast, Brazil, Southern America);Alagoas (Brazil Northeast, Brazil, Southern America);Pernambuco (Brazil Northeast, Brazil, Southern America);Sergipe (Brazil Northeast, Brazil, Southern America);

remarks: doi:10.1590/1677-941X-ABB-2023-0026 Etymology: The epithet helix is applied as a noun in apposition and represents a Latin and English word for spiral or coil.
